creditmemo.main_content:
CREDIT MEMO FOR INVOICE #{{pdf.invoice.increment_id}} 

Grand total: {{pdf.invoice.base_grand_total}} USD
Tax: {{pdf.invoice.base_tax_amount}} USD 
Total qty:{{pdf.invoice.total_qty}} 

Firstname:{{pdf.order.customer_firstname}}
Lastname:{{pdf.order.customer_lastname}}
